item.title: Leonard Nimoy, dies at 83
Heroes Reborn Teaser
item.description: I know what people say about Heroes, and no I won’t link to them. Who cares, I loved that show. And sadto see some of the original cast won’t be (and glad about some, I hated Claire’s character) but seriously watch the teaser, DAMN! You can follow the author or shout at him on Twitter

item.title: Netflix's Daredevil Teaser
item.description: Daredevil heads to the tv screen! And it is bloody! Let’s hope it can make us forget all about that bad, bad movie. Yes you know which one I am talking about. You have just removed it from your memory. You can follow the author or shout at him on Twitter

item.title: House of Cards and China
item.description: Many of you watch this series, and many of you love it. It may be the acting or the overly dramatized politics. There is no doubt House of Cards is a very popular series, not even going into how amazing it is that Netflix is making such amazing original content, as that is a whole seperate post; let’s talk about its popularity abroad. To say Chinese people get the wrong idea of American politics by watching this series is again a half statement.
